name: Backend Only Dev Container
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'ls -la /app && if [ -d /root/.ssh ]; then chmod 700 /root/.ssh && chmod 600 /root/.ssh/config 2>/dev/null || true && chmod 600 /root/.ssh/id_ed25519 2>/dev/null || true && chmod 600 /root/.ssh/id_ed25519_octa 2>/dev/null || true && chmod 644 /root/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub 2>/dev/null || true && chmod 644 /root/.ssh/id_ed25519_octa.pub 2>/dev/null || true && chmod 644 /root/.ssh/known_hosts 2>/dev/null || true; fi'
